DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to evaluate safety and efficacy of long-term exposure of KHK4827 in subjects with moderate to severe plaque psoriasis who have completed the preceding Study 4827-002.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Clinical Study of KHK4827
DOC.criteria: Subject has voluntarily signed the written informed consent form to participate in this study Subject has completed the week 12 evaluation of Study 4827002 Subject has had a serious infection, defined as requiring systemic treatment with antibiotics or antivirals (excluding oral administration) Subject has been judged to be ineligible for participation in the study by the investigators/subinvestigators
